name: Unown
flavorText:
Their shapes look
like hieroglyphs
on ancient tab­ lets. It is said
that the two are
somehow related.
formDescription: Forms only affect appearance.  A form is determined at random before a wild encounter and cannot be changed.

previous.name: Misdreavus
previous.flavorText:
It likes playing
mischievous tricks
such as screaming and wailing to
startle people at
night.

next.name: Wobbuffet
next.flavorText:
It hates light and
shock. If attack­
ed, it inflates its body to pump
up its counter­
strike.

like hieroglyphs
on ancient tab­ lets. It is said
that the two are
somehow related.
